qa.name: Captain Sarah Chen
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with short black hair

tr.name: Dr. James Morrison
tr.appearance: Middle-aged, with glasses and a kind smile

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, silence became my constant companion.
json_to_edit.description: Captain Sarah Chen grapples with isolation aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Low hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen confronts loneliness while on a long-term mission in space.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast darkness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Captain Chen working at a computer console, her face reflecting the screen's glow.

tr.action: Captain Chen's eyes, showing a mix of determination and longing as she gazes at a family photo.

xc.action: ARIA's holographic form materializes, offering companionship to Captain Chen.

ka.action: Captain Chen floating through the space station, touching various surfaces for stability.

fn.action: A screen showing Dr. Morrison during a video call, his expression concerned yet supportive.

af.action: Captain Chen in the observation module, staring at the Earth, a tear floating away from her eye.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 5, 2, 7, 1, 4, 6, 3. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale:
we need to rearrange the order of shots as requested by the edit command. the current order of shots is represented by the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object. we'll update this field to reflect the new order: 5, 2, 7, 1, 4, 6, 3. 

the current order is: qa, hf, tr, xc, ka, fn, af
the new order will be: ka, hf, af, qa, xc, fn, tr

we'll update the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object to reflect this new order. no other changes are needed, as per the instruction to not change anything else.
